testimonial.name: Jean-Marc Rousseau
testimonial.quote: ubiweb transformed my plumbing business in Montreal. I went from 5-6 calls per week to 20+ qualified leads per month. Their team understands contractors - they don't just talk marketing fluff, they deliver real jobs.

testimonial.name: Mike Thompson
testimonial.quote: ubiweb's Toronto plumber marketing strategy completely changed my business. My phone rings constantly now with quality leads, not tire-kickers. Best investment I've made in 15 years of plumbing.

testimonial.name: David Chen
testimonial.quote: Working with ubiweb was the smartest decision for my Vancouver plumbing company. They understand the local market and deliver consistent, high-quality leads month after month.

testimonial.name: Robert MacLeod
testimonial.quote: ubiweb helped my Calgary plumbing business thrive even during the economic downturn. Their targeted approach brings in steady, qualified leads that convert to paying customers.

faqs.question: How quickly will I see results?
faqs.answer: Most {{city}} {{plural}} see increased calls within 30-60 days. Google Ads can drive immediate traffic, while SEO typically takes 3-6 months for full results.

faqs.question: Do you work with {{plural}} outside {{city}}?
faqs.answer: Yes! While we specialize in {{city}} {{service}} marketing, we serve {{service}} contractors across {{province}} and Canada with localized strategies.

faqs.question: What makes you different from other marketing agencies?
faqs.answer: We specialize exclusively in blue-collar trades. We understand your business, speak your language, and focus on generating actual jobs - not just website traffic.

faqs.question: How much should I budget for Google Ads?
faqs.answer: We typically recommend $1,500-$3,000/month for Google Ads in {{city}}, depending on your service area and competition level.
